Title: Relates to certain economic development programs
Summary: Relates to certain economic development programs; requires reporting on the use of fiber-optic technology in certain economic development grant programs; adds access to high-speed broadband internet service as consideration in certain competitive grant projects.
LawCode: Amd §100-a, Ec Dev L; amd §§16-d & 16-n, UDC Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to certain economic development programs
